languages.text: "Если им так нужно Горнило, пусть договорятся и обслуживают его по очереди".
"If they all need the Crucible so badly, then they should agree to alternate service to it."
languages.original_text: "Если им так нужно Горнило, пусть договорятся и обслуживают его по очереди".

traits.locale_text: "They need the Crucible so badly, then they should agree to serve it in turns."
"They need the Crucible so badly, then they should agree to serve it in turns."

languages.text: “既然双方都这么想要熔炉，那他们应该达成协议，轮流使用。”
languages.original_text: "If they all need the Crucible so badly, then they should agree to alternate service to it."

traits.locale_text: “既然双方都这么想要熔炉，那他们应该达成协议，轮流使用。”

languages.text: «Si tanto necesitan el Crisol, deberían aceptar alternarse en su servicio».
languages.original_text: "If they all need the Crucible so badly, then they should agree to alternate service to it."

traits.locale_text: «Si tanto necesitan el Crisol, deberían aceptar alternarse en su servicio».

languages.text: 「奴らは全員そんなに坩堝を必要としているのであれば、坩堝を交互に利用することに同意すべきだ」
languages.original_text: "If they all need the Crucible so badly, then they should agree to alternate service to it."

traits.locale_text: 「奴らは全員そんなに坩堝を必要としているのであれば、坩堝を交互に利用することに同意すべきだ」

languages.text: « S'ils ont tant besoin du Creuset, ils devraient accepter d'en partager la jouissance. »
languages.original_text: "If they all need the Crucible so badly, then they should agree to alternate service to it."

traits.locale_text: « S'ils ont tant besoin du Creuset, ils devraient accepter d'en partager la jouissance. »

languages.text: "Wenn sie den Tiegel alle so dringend brauchen, dann sollten sie sich darauf einigen, ihn abwechselnd zu nutzen."
languages.original_text: "If they all need the Crucible so badly, then they should agree to alternate service to it."

traits.locale_text: "Wenn sie den Tiegel alle so dringend brauchen, dann sollten sie sich darauf einigen, ihn abwechselnd zu nutzen."

languages.text: "Pota'ya hepsinin bu kadar ihtiyaçları varsa o hâlde dönüşümlü olarak hizmetlerini sunmalılar."
languages.original_text: "If they all need the Crucible so badly, then they should agree to alternate service to it."
